titles.title: San Joaquin Valley Transportation Enhancement Act of 2011
To allow certain Federal funding provided to the State of California to be used for a project or activity to improve or maintain California State Route 99, and for other purposes.
San Joaquin Valley Transportation Enhancement Act of 2011

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary: San Joaquin Valley Transportation Enhancement Act of 2011 - Allows stimulus funds made available to California for highspeed rail service development under the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 (ARRA) to be used for any project to improve or maintain California State Route 99 between the cities of Sacramento and Bakersfield.
